content: these stranded colour work socks are knitted cuff down one size medium app 37 eur size fits the foot circumference of 22 5 23 5 cm and leg circumference of 23 23 5 cm leg length can be adjusted **materials ** fingering weight sock yarn rellana garne flotte socke 4 fach uni solids 938 tanne main colour 210 m rellana garne flotte socke 4 fach uni solids 995 hellgrün contrast colour 105 m **needles** 2 25 us size 1 circular needles for using magic loop **gauge** 9 stitches per inch 2 5 cm stranded colour work and 9 row per inch 2 5cm feel free to use larger/smaller needles and thinner/thicker fingering weight yarn to adjust the gauge and size of socks pattern includes both written instructions and colour work charts this pattern was not tested knitted only by me so far - comments reports of mistakes in written instructions are welcomed
